VideoTitle: Introduction to ASP.NET MVC: (02) Creating and Configuring Models
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Investigate how to create models (the data that the application will be working on). Learn how to add metadata to classes to allow MVC to automatically generate HTML. [01:41] - What is a Model?[10:26]

VideoTitle: Introduction to ASP.NET MVC: (04) Deep Dive into Controllers
Author: JeffKoch

VideoTitle: Introduction to ASP.NET MVC: (05) Deep Dive into Views
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Investigate the code that goes into views. Learn how to create a view from scratch, plus how to customize the ones created by Visual Studio. Get an introduction to the HTML Helpers provided with MVC.
